price: Àwọn wọ̀nyẹn ni èrò inú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra. Olùṣegbére ni wọ́n nínú rẹ̀. (Ó jẹ́) ẹ̀san nítorí ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati khālidīna fīhā jazāan bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
